unnormalised: Regarding the recent increase in dengue cases reported by the MoHFW, it's crucial to adhere to the guidelines issued on 12/07/2024. normalised: Regarding the recent increase in dengue cases reported by the M-o-H-F-W, it's crucial to adhere to the guidelines issued on twelfth July two thousand and twenty four. Citizens are advised to eliminate stagnant water sources to prevent mosquito breeding. Furthermore, if symptoms like fever above one hundred degree Fahrenheit are observed, consulting a physician like Doctor Sharma is recommended before self-medicating with drugs like paracetamol. Local municipalities should intensify fogging campaigns in high-risk areas as per the N-V-B-D-C-P directives.
